author: itv.com
title: Around The House: Watch this month's programme | Tyne Tees
text:
Paul Brand talks to Redcar MP Anna Turley about the closure of SSI - and Business Minister Anna Soubry discusses the rescue package for Teesside. Watch the full programme here:
Play video Paul Brand will present the next edition of Around The House on Thursday 19th November at 10.40pm.
Last updated Thu 15 Oct 2015 Politics Around The House Sunderland York North Yorkshire Newcastle County Durham Gateshead durham Northumberland Teesside Tyne and Wear Middlesbrough
